cast.name: 里卡尔多·斯卡马奇奥 Riccardo Scamarcio
阿尔芭·罗尔瓦赫尔 Alba Rohrwacher

writer.name: 费迪南多·西托·菲洛马里诺 Ferdinando Cito Filomarino

director.name: 费迪南多·西托·菲洛马里诺 Ferdinando Cito Filomarino

introduction: The nominated short film at the Locarno Int’l Film Festival starring Alba Rohrwacher, Riccardo Scamarcio and Louis Garrel tells the story of two young men, Giano and Luc, who hardly know each other. They are traveling through a wood when a sudden storm breaks, forcing them to take shelter in Luc’s spacious villa. With the ice broken, they start wrestling playfully, but suddenly, an accident happens. Panic-stricken, Giano doesn’t know whether Luc is knocked out or dead. Unexpectedly, Luc’s sister arrives home.
